content: When you sign up for an account on Quantum Revision, we collect certain personal information, including your username and email address. This information is necessary to create and manage your account.
Your username and email address are used to provide you with access to Quantum Revision and to communicate with you regarding your account, updates, and important notifications.

We understand the importance of data privacy, which is why we provide you with the option to delete your account at any time. When you choose to delete your account, all associated data, including your username and email address, will be permanently removed from our system.
We take the security of your personal information seriously and have implemented measures to safeguard it against unauthorized access, misuse, or alteration.

Quantum Revision may use third-party services, such as hosting providers and analytics tools, to improve our service and user experience. These third parties may have access to your personal information only to the extent necessary to perform their functions and are obligated to protect your data.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates.
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at `mukulpadwal.me@gmail.com`.
